title: The certainty of divine revelation A sermon preached at St. Martins in the Fields, Feb. 4. 1694/5. Being the second of the lecture for the ensuing year, founded by the honourable Robert Boyle, Esquire. By John Williams, D.D. chaplain in ordinary to His Majesty.
author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
publisher: printed for Ri. Chiswell, and Tho. Cockerill: at the Rose and Crown in St. Paul's Church-yard; and at the Three Legs in the Poultrey,
